name: Protection from Spells
components: V, S, M (diamond worth 500 gp), F (One 1,000 gp diamond per target. Each subject must carry the gem for the duration of the spell. If a subject loses the gem, the spell ceases to affect him.)
text: The subject gains a +8 resistance bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities (but not against supernatural and extraordinary abilities).
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 材料 (价值500gp的钻石), 器材 (每个目标需要价值1000gp的钻石, 每个
target_zh: 至多每四级1个接触到的生物
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 受术者在对抗法术和类法术能力 (但不包括超自然能力和特异能力) 时豁免获得+8抗力加值。
